title: Scrolls
content: ed by 3m Scroll of Speak with Dead Allow a corpse that still has a mouth and is not an undead to answer 5 questions to the caster. Scroll of Chill Touch Assail a creature with the chill of the grave. It takes 1d8 Necrotic and cannot regain hit points. Undead creatures also get disadvantage on attack rolls. Scroll of Misty Step Surrounded by black mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Scroll of Mirror Image Create 3 illusory duplicates of yourself to distract attackers. Each one
